translation: 启用王国及公国总督制。
允许王国及公国总督府

original: A plot gains strength by having more powerful backers. Higher Plot Power will unlock more special plot decisions and events. Having your spymaster Build Spy Network at your plot target location will further increase your Plot Power.
translation: 密谋通过获得更多有力支持者来提高成功率，高密谋值会解锁更多的特殊密谋决议和事件。让你的间谍主管在你的密谋目标的所在地建立间谍网将会进一步提高你的密谋成功率。

original: §Y$VASSAL$§! is no longer a participant in §YThe $VASSAL_WAR$§! as $PRONOUN$ liege §Y$LIEGE$§! joined §YThe $LIEGE_WAR$§! as §Y$SIDE$§!.
translation: §Y$VASSAL$§!不再是§Y$VASSAL_WAR$§!的参与者，因为$PRONOUN$封君§Y$LIEGE$§!作为§Y$SIDE$§!加入了§Y$LIEGE_WAR$§!。
不是某场战争的防御方

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the treacherous [From.GetTitledName] has gone back on [From.GetHerHis] word and refused to aid you against the Umayyads!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，叛徒[From.GetTitledName]背弃了[From.GetHerHis]诺言，拒绝支援你反抗伍麦叶王朝！

original: Tribal vassals will now provide you with levies.\n
translation: 部落封臣将会向你提供常备军。\n

original: Tribal vassals will no longer provide you with levies.\n
translation: 部落封臣将会停止向你提供常备军。\n

original: Tribal vassals will now provide you with taxes.\n
translation: 部落封臣将会向你上缴税金。\n

original: Tribal vassals will no longer provide you with taxes.\n
translation: 部落封臣将会停止向你上缴税金。\n

original: Independent Tribal or Nomadic Rulers do not get taxes from their vassals
translation: 独立的部落或游牧领主不会从他们的封臣那收到税金
